channel.title: Questions bout making a bot
channel.description: First of all i would like to say that I only know basic java, and i don't know much about runescape clients or the packets, but what i would like to know is how do i go about creating hooks?

item.title: Questions bout making a bot
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

That’s the kind of question that can’t really be answered without a bit more knowledge of how the bot you are trying to write works.

Do you know what a hook is/does, first?

Read full topic
